actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove the payment limitation imposed under such title with respect to the furnishing of psychiatric services in a nursing facility.

summary.text: Amends part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to reduce copayments for outpatient mental health services for skilled nursing facility residents.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove the payment limitation imposed under such title with respect to the furnishing of psychiatric services in a nursing facility.
